reviews.author: Anna Morrow
reviews.review: My boyfriend and I moved in April of this year. We are quite happy where we live the people are friendly and place is always clean. We love the security here. Recommend

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Anna We love having you guys

reviews.author: Laura Willkie (Tabs)
reviews.review: I met w a client here i was very impressed w the front door security, the building was nice and my clients apt was cozy, i got lost anda nice man knew exactly where i was to go.  Very impressed

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your kind words. By the end of the year all common areas will have state of the art audio and video surveillance. We are excited about the new security up grade.
